results.content:
Good course for beginners who need practice of basics of react and firebase.
This course can be a stepping stone to more advanced courses due to repetition of concepts throughout the course.
"Mistakes" made by the instructor are the ones that every beginner will face eventually, so I find this approach helpful.
results.content_html:
Good course for beginners who need practice of basics of react and firebase.

results.content: A very clear and concise treatment of React JS framework. An ideal start up course to get you up and running in React
results.content_html: A very clear and concise treatment of React JS framework. An ideal start up course to get you up and running in React
